definition[0]: a small piece of material used to clean a wound or take a small amount of a substance from someone’s body in order to test it
definition[1]: a small amount of a substance that is taken from someone’s body with a swab in order to test it
example[1]: The doctor took a throat swab to check for infection.
definition[2]: to clean something using a large amount of water
example[2]: a girl who was swabbing the tiled floor with a mop
definition[3]: to clean a wound with a small piece of special material
